post.text: We all need work to understand what it's like for black parents to worry about the safety of their kids.

comment.author: Aspen
comment.text: The safety of their children starts with the parents controlling and disciplining them. Raising then to be respectful to EVERYONE. Helping the police with investigations that would lead to the removal of the bad elements in their neighborhoods. Safety starts at home.

replies.author: Aspen
replies.text: Yep... and proud to never support a lying crook in politics... or anywhere else.... their are young men in prison for the same "mishandling of classified" material.
